solution_line_template: Each batch serves {people_per_batch} people, and there are {total_people} people coming to the party, so she needs to make {total_people} / {people_per_batch} = <<{total_people}/{people_per_batch}={num_batches}>>{num_batches} batches.
Each batch requires {avocados_per_batch} avocados, so she will need {avocados_per_batch} * {num_batches} = <<{avocados_per_batch}*{num_batches}={total_avocados}>>{total_avocados} avocados.
